Uses of Interface
net.viktorc.pp4j.api.ProcessManager

  • Packages that use ProcessManager 
    Package Description
    net.viktorc.pp4j.api  
    net.viktorc.pp4j.impl  

    • Uses of ProcessManager in net.viktorc.pp4j.api

      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.api that return ProcessManager 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ProcessManager ProcessManagerFactory.newProcessManager()
      Constructs and returns a new instance of the ProcessManager interface.

    • Uses of ProcessManager in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

      Classes in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl that implement ProcessManager 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractProcessManager
      An abstract implementation of the ProcessManager interface that allows for the definition of the process builder instance to use to launch the processes, the duration of continuous idleness after which processes are to be terminated, and the character set to use when exchanging messages with the processes through their standard streams.
      class  JavaProcessManager<T extends Runnable & Serializable>
      A sub-class of AbstractProcessManager for the management of process instances of the JavaProcess class.
      class  SimpleProcessManager
      A simple sub-class of the AbstractProcessManager class that relies on instances of functional interfaces passed to its constructor to implement the SimpleProcessManager.startsUpInstantly(), AbstractProcessManager.isStartedUp(String, boolean), SimpleProcessManager.getInitSubmission(), and SimpleProcessManager.getTerminationSubmission() methods.
      Fields in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl declared as ProcessManager 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected ProcessManager AbstractProcessExecutor.manager  
      Methods in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl that return ProcessManager 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ProcessManager JavaProcessManagerFactory.newProcessManager()  
      Constructors in net.viktorc.pp4j.impl with parameters of type ProcessManager 
      Constructor Description
      AbstractProcessExecutor​(ProcessManager manager, ExecutorService threadPool)
      Constructs an executor for the specified process using threadPool to provide the threads required for listening to the standard streams of the process and ensuring that the process is terminated once it times out if the getKeepAliveTime() method of manager returns a non-empty optional.
      SimpleProcessExecutor​(ProcessManager manager)
      Constructs a process executor instance using the argument to manage the life-cycle of the process.
